original_text: When she saw that he had left his cloak in her hand and had run out of the house,
korean_text: 그 여인이 요셉이 그의 옷을 자기 손에 버려두고 도망하여 나감을 보고

sentences.original_text: that he had left his cloak in her hand
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 겉옷을 그녀의 손에 두고 갔다는 것을

sentences.original_text: and had run out of the house
